attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in current UK Conservative Gov
attributes.additional_details: Because of this it now takes 1 month to see a G.P they have sanctioned the use of bee killing pesticides against all professional advice..and are secretly trying to bring back the hunt... Plus the recent inaction against IDS calls for resignation over decieving the general public....If you are sick of this all for profit and mates rates for peers mentality please sign my petition
attributes.background: This current UK Tory Gov is systematically dismantling U.K peoples rights they cannot provide housing there are more people living in poverty than in recent memory they are bullying disabled people into work... They have lied about the recent W.C.A death reports they are destroying the NHS

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104544

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
